titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation for putting the laws in execution against forestalling, regrating and ingrossing of corn ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at Whitehall, the thirteenth day of October, 1698. In the tenth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
